name: @scicave/math-parser
description: A mathematical parser. We mean by mathematical that, e.g., arithmetic operations is considered for example if you pass "1+2", the result would by a (add node "+") with two children nodes of type number.

scripts.start: nodemon -w src -w tools -e js,pegjs --exec npm run build
scripts.prod: node ./tools/generate-version-file.js && npm run build && npm run bundle
scripts.bundle: parcel build ./lib/index.js -d ./lib -o bundle.min.js && parcel build ./lib/index.js --no-minify -d ./lib -o bundle.js

author: scicave
